Directives: collection-label

collection-label

collection-label(help, label, attribute)

Header label for collections. This component displays header text as well as collection validation errors.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
help String

Optional help tooltip to display on hover. By default this makes use of the Angular Bootstrap tooltip directive and the Font Awesome icon set.
label String

Field label string. This string can contain HTML markup.
attribute String

Name of collection within validation rules
Source:
  • directives/collection-label.js, line 1
Example
// To display a simple collection header:
<collection-label  label="Hobbies" attribute="hobbies">
</collection-label>
